pages.text: Pursuing $(marked)ascension$() is the preferred method of acquiring more power and knowledge. It is also essential for unlocking $(marked)obfuscated text$() and deciphering it.$(br)Ascension is always dedicated towards a Great Old One, so you must pick a path. Each ascension is different in a way, so make sure to check them in the $(marked)Great Old Ones chapter.$()

An aspect common to all ascensions is that they will eventually grant you $(marked)blessings$(). These are individually explained in respective entries. Starting an ascension will also immediately grant you an inherent $(ml:world/affiliation)affiliation$().
